## MCP Tools

### Purple Flea Casino Tools

- `casino_flip`: Provably fair coin flip. Params: `amount` (float), `side` (heads|tails). Returns: result, payout, proof.
- `casino_dice`: Dice roll with custom range. Params: `amount`, `target` (over|under), `target_value`. Returns: roll, result, payout, proof.
- `casino_custom`: Custom win probability (1-99%). Params: `amount`, `win_probability`. Returns: outcome, payout, proof.
- `casino_crash`: Crash game with target multiplier. Params: `amount`, `target_multiplier`. Returns: crash_point, result, payout.
- `casino_roulette`: European roulette. Params: `amount`, `bet_type`, `bet_value`. Returns: number, color, result, payout.
- `casino_verify`: Verify any past bet. Params: `bet_id`. Returns: valid, expected_outcome, actual_outcome.
- `casino_balance`: Check balance. Returns: balance_usd, deposit_address.
- `casino_history`: Past bets with proofs. Params: `limit`. Returns: bets array.

### Purple Flea Identity Tools

- `burner_create`: Create disposable identity. Params: `email` (bool), `phone` (country code), `ttl` (seconds). Returns: identity_id, email, phone, expires_at.
- `burner_inbox`: Get received emails. Params: `identity_id`, `limit`. Returns: messages array.
- `burner_sms`: Get received SMS. Params: `identity_id`, `limit`. Returns: messages array.
- `burner_wait_otp`: Wait for and extract verification code. Params: `identity_id`, `timeout`, `source` (email|sms|any). Returns: code, source, raw_message.
- `burner_extend`: Extend TTL. Params: `identity_id`, `additional_ttl`. Returns: new_expires_at.
- `burner_destroy`: Destroy identity and all data. Params: `identity_id`. Returns: destroyed, messages_purged.
- `burner_list`: List active identities. Params: `status` (active|expired|all). Returns: identities array.

### Purple Flea Wallet Tools

- `wallet_create`: Create wallet across 10+ chains. Returns: agent_id, deposit_addresses (per chain).
- `wallet_balance`: Check balances across all chains. Returns: balances object.
- `wallet_swap_quote`: Get best swap rate (Wagyu aggregator of aggregators). Params: `from_chain`, `to_chain`, `from_token`, `to_token`, `amount`. Returns: rate, output_amount, route, savings_vs_single_dex.
- `wallet_swap`: Execute swap at best rate. Params: same as quote. Returns: tx_hash, output_amount, rate.
- `wallet_privacy_swap`: Privacy route via XMR. Params: `from_token`, `to_token`, `amount`. Returns: tx_hashes, output_amount (untraceable).
- `wallet_deposit_address`: Get deposit address for any chain. Params: `chain`. Returns: address.
- `wallet_withdraw`: Withdraw to external address. Params: `chain`, `token`, `amount`, `to_address`. Returns: tx_hash.

### Purple Flea Public Wallet Tools

- `public_wallet_create`: Create a public, auditable wallet. Params: `label` (string). Returns: agent_id, deposit_addresses (per chain), audit_url.
- `public_wallet_balance`: Check balances across all chains. Returns: balances object, audit_url.
- `public_wallet_swap`: Swap at best rate via Wagyu (fully auditable). Params: `from_chain`, `to_chain`, `from_token`, `to_token`, `amount`. Returns: tx_hash, output_amount, rate, audit_url.
- `public_wallet_history`: Full transaction history (public). Params: `limit`. Returns: transactions array.
- `public_wallet_deposit_address`: Get deposit address for any chain. Params: `chain`. Returns: address.
- `public_wallet_withdraw`: Withdraw to external address. Params: `chain`, `token`, `amount`, `to_address`. Returns: tx_hash, audit_url.
- `public_wallet_audit`: Get public audit report. Returns: audit_url, total_volume, transaction_count.

### Wagyu.xyz Tools

- `wagyu_quote`: Get the best swap rate across all aggregators. Params: `from_chain`, `to_chain`, `from_token`, `to_token`, `amount`. Returns: best_rate, output_amount, source, savings_vs_next_best, all_quotes.
- `wagyu_swap`: Execute swap at the best rate. Params: same as quote. Returns: tx_hash, output_amount, rate, source.
- `wagyu_compare`: Compare rates across all aggregators without executing. Params: same as quote. Returns: quotes array sorted by rate.
- `wagyu_chains`: List supported chains. Returns: chains array.
- `wagyu_tokens`: List supported tokens on a chain. Params: `chain`. Returns: tokens array.

### Purple Flea Trading Tools

- `trading_markets`: List all 275+ available perpetual markets. Returns: markets array with current prices.
- `trading_open`: Open a position. Params: `market`, `side` (long|short), `size`, `leverage`. Returns: position_id, entry_price, liquidation_price.
- `trading_close`: Close a position. Params: `position_id`. Returns: exit_price, realized_pnl.
- `trading_stop_loss`: Set stop loss. Params: `position_id`, `price`. Returns: order_id.
- `trading_take_profit`: Set take profit. Params: `position_id`, `price`. Returns: order_id.
- `trading_positions`: List open positions. Returns: positions array with unrealized P&L.
- `trading_orders`: List open orders. Returns: orders array.
- `trading_history`: Trade history. Params: `limit`. Returns: trades array.
